text:
@PMOIndia @narendramodi @PMOIndia As 21 days lockdown proved effective to avert the spread of coronavirus. Cases still increasing. Many cities converted into hotspots. After the discussion with the CM of different states, PM Modi extended lockdown till 3 May. #IndiaFightsCorona

https://t.co/FwlhoB1nT2
